title: t207 Fournier Broadleaf back for sale
author: shammus

posts.post_title: t207 Fournier Broadleaf back for sale
posts.post_content:
Has some creasing and wear on the front and back but is a Broadleaf back that's affordable at least!  Asking $110 delivered.

Would also trade for 1918 Zeenuts or 1915 Cracker Jack commons.  

thanks in advance!
Brian

Bump...still available....cheap price for a Broadleaf back!
